CustomField.formula: if( CONTAINS( text( StageName ) , "Closed" ) , 1 , IF( or( text( SBU__c ) <> "D&S" , isnull( Win_Probability__c ) , Win_Probability__c = 0 ) , IF( or( text( SBU__c ) <> "D&S" , isnull( Probability__c ) , Probability__c = 0 ) , Probability, Probability__c ) , Win_Probability__c )) * Amount
CustomField.label: Net Amount
